translations: 使分心，使转移注意力；<古>使困惑，使迷惑

sentences.sentence: It was all a ploy to distract attention from his real aims.
sentences.translation: 那全是障眼法，借以转移对他真实目的的注意。

sentences.sentence: It was another attempt to distract attention from the truth.
sentences.translation: 这又是企图分散人们对事实真相的注意力。

sentences.sentence: It serves to distract a predator while the octopus makes its escape.
sentences.translation: 它的作用是在章鱼逃跑时分散捕食者的注意力。
